title: Candidate assessment
description: Explore our comprehensive assessment process, designed to evaluate your suitability for ketamine therapy and engage in a discussion about your mental health needs.

title: Meet with our clinicians
description: Get to know our team of seasoned clinicians who specialize in ketamine therapy and discover the significance of consulting with them as a crucial step in your treatment process.

title: Personalized treatment plan
description: We recognize that every individual's journey is unique. Before your therapy begins, we take the time to understand your specific needs, concerns, and goals. Your treatment plan is tailored to you, ensuring that your experience is both meaningful and effective.

title: Guided emotional support
description: The psychedelic experience can be deeply introspective and emotionally profound. Our therapists are skilled in providing emotional support during your journey, helping you process insights and emotions that arise, and facilitating a therapeutic dialogue that promotes healing.

title: Continuous integration
description: We don't just guide you during your ketamine sessions; we're here to support your integration afterward. We help you translate the insights gained during your journey into practical, positive changes in your daily life. Your journey with us extends beyond the session room.
